answers.answer: Im 30wks and get the same. My iron came back extremely low. I take an Iron supplement in addition to my prenatal now and also was cut back on caffein to see If that helped. You do swell more the further in pregnancy you are..
I would call my dr...those symptoms could be normal pregnancy stuff, but could be preeclampsia.....they could tell you if its something to worry about

question: Today I have been feeling a lil woozy. my feet are looking swallowen and feeling heavy.  As well as my hands and fingers. I also feel dizzy and my head spinning.  What kind of signs are thoses. What should I do
title: dizzy!!!!!
